avail.title: 5th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
avail.author: Hickerson, Jay

links.url: /Library Files/R Series/Refreshment Time With Singin' Sam/
links.label: Library Files

infos.info: When Transcribed music was banned by the musicians union in 1942. Sam absented himself from the airways.
When the Transcribed music ban was abolished, Same returned to a syndicated show.
